Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a game-winning home run in the 10th inning
Giancarlo Stanton tied the game with a home run in the 5th inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees are AL champions for the 41st time in franchise history
The Yankees are en route to their first World Series since 2009
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees made a significant decision to trade for Juan Soto last December
The Yankees bullpen held the Guardians off the scoreboard in the latter part of the game
Others: The Yankees will wait to see how the National League shakes out to determine their opponent in the World Series
The game took 10 innings to decide
